nodes.text: A physiological enhancement system was a type of advance, custom-tailored system that provided medical diagnostics, ergonomic adjustments, and powered support systems tuned to its wearer's motor functions. Its heart-rate regulation and temperature-control systems greatly reduced stress and pain, and physical tasks required less considerable effort. These benefits came at a significant cost, however, as the systems required careful calibration to the wearer's specific needs and physique.

Although physiological enhancement systems were normally tailored to the physiology of an individual, they were capable of being produced for clone troopers of the Galactic Republic's clone army through a standardized template, which helped to reduce the cost. They were also capable of being equipped to laminate, clone trooper armor, and heavy battle armor.

Physiological enhancement systems were mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
